DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety weight loss sibutramine use overweight obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IV , Multi-Center , Open-Label Trial Sibutramine Combination With Hypocaloric Diet Obese Overweight Thai Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Subject nutritional obesity BMI > 30 kg/m Type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus Inadequately control hypertension History Gilles de la Tourette 's Syndrome . Use MAOIs , SSRIs , amino acid , antimigraine drug , opioids Hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism . History : benign prostatic hyperplasia neurological disorder psychiatric illness severe renal hepatic impairment narrowangle glaucoma History cardiovascular disease cerebrovascular disease Persistent tachycardia rest Pulmonary hypertension Phaeochromocytoma
